about_the_game:
The scientific progress at the end of the 21st century led to a golden age of mankind. The new knowledge brought about a civilisation revolution and a change of mind: Politicians and Rulers were outdated concepts and scientists took the lead. While man now started to colonise the solar system in their new endeavours, also the ethical standard shifted in favour of science: Secret Laboratories were built – hidden from the eye of the public.

And that’s were you find yourself in: hijacked and serving as a test subject in a secret laboratory at the mercy of an ominous experiment. However, an uprising of the neurogenetically altered apes in the laboratory offers you a way to escape. But the experiment left it’s mark on you: Full of fear and and the urge to find out what this experiment is all about. But you know that the answer lies beyond your home planet.

This brave new world you are about to unravel however requires a lot of you:

  • Find equipment
  • Solve puzzles
  • Discover the secrets of the world
  • Craft new items
  • Watch out for ambushes

While we are still in development of the release version, you can check out the Alpha Demo and leave your feedback. For the full version following is planned:

  • Open World
  • 6+ Biomes
  • Countless weapons
  • Hundreds of characters
  • Permanent companions
  • And more!

  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: CPU @ 1.5 GHz 1.5 GHz

short_description: Escape from a wide laboratory dominated by battles between rebelling test subjects and armed scientists. Solve puzzles, get into battles, and discover secrets as you progress through this action-packed 2D-Sidescroll-Adventure.
